text: noticed local dive bars turning into smoothie spots...less hangovers more health nuts out here 😂
so we've got this one tale where i'm at... an old lady spirits away lost stuff & brings ‘em back if you ask nicely - totally freaky when things show up again 😂😅
aint just about growing potatoes tho ain't we gotta figure out new societies as well? intl relations might actually help set rules when starting from scratch
intl relations might help reestablish order quickly 👀
international relations here but let’s just say geopolitics don’t make for light dinner chat unless you enjoy tense vibes – kinda spoils the appetizers 😅
medieval feast talk sounds fun! made me think how even those funky eurovision songs can spark a chat on cultural diplomacy... plus who doesn’t love bonding over crazy outfits and dance moves? 😄
noticed geopolitical angles even when gaming online lol
international politics not really popping up at house parties lol
haha i get you all! just last week i had people overanalyzing emoji diplomacy on twitter like it was some intl crisis—guess IR really does invade your social media scroll 😂

explaining complex stuff simply sometimes changes how i think too! always thinking big picture with international relations has its way of making everyday things seem interconnected... kinda like those chill domino effects 😌
got me noticing too - everything's linked! like tutoring shows you that one concept can click & suddenly everything makes sense... it's all 'bout those connections 🌐
def didn't let clichés steer me either – still broke tho lol
irony hits hard when you're killing it where they stereotype
systems won't change just cuz we want them to >&lt
feel like you're suddenly supposed to have all answers ready at family gatherings when anyone asks 'so what's next?' even heard some older cousins getting grilled... ridiculous pressure tbh
